## R Packages

[mRchmadness](https://saberpowers.shinyapps.io/mRchmadness/){target=_blank} --- Numerical tools for filling out an NCAA basketball tournament bracket

[npmr](https://cran.rstudio.com/web/packages/npmr/index.html){target=_blank} --- Nuclear Penalized Multinomial Regression

[sabRmetrics](https://saberpowers.github.io/sabRmetrics/){target=_blank} --- Query {statsapi,baseballsavant}.mlb.com and fit fundamental sabermetric models
